overview:
Beat My Secret is here to provide people from around the globe a platform to share their deepest and darkest secrets comfortably, and anonymously. The idea originally was proposed by Spill Your Brain in April of 2009. Recently, people have started utilizing the service for what it is here for, letting off steam.

We expect that users of this site will use necessary restraint and not post secrets that are overly explicit or obscene, doing so will result in a removal of the story.

With the current site, brand new features and cleaner coding, commenting, following, and advising has never been easier. We pride ourselves for offering membership for free and registering takes less than a minute. Thank you for your continued support and we encourage sharing the site with everyone. After all, everyone loves secrets….

Beat My Secret is run by young, college student entrepreneurs. Being so, times can sometimes be financially tough. If you would like help support Beat My Secret, please donate on the about page.
